page.title: 10S.Leic.Boys Brigade.
page.content: {My name is Peter. }I am 8.My brother { {Gary}and I go to Boys Brigade together by car.It takes 3 minutes.{My name is {David}and I am 8 too.I walk with my mother.It takes us 5 minutes to get there.We both go to Boys Brigade at South Wigston Methodist Church.We meet at 6pm till 7.15pm on Wednesday nights.First we get into our teams of 5 and pay our subscriptions.The teams are-Tigers,Lions,Cheetahs and Leopards and each has a leader.We listen to a bible story for 5 minutes say a prayer and then play games.Sometimes we go outdoors to play rounders or cricket on South Wigston High School field. Sometimes we do cooking.At Easter we made Easter egg cakes.In charge of the junior boys is Mrs.Bromley.We wear a red jumper with an anchor badge and black trousers.We have a football team which plays on Saturday afternoons.
